TopicTitle: [REQUEST] KOS set wheelthrottle to engine throttle

Articles.Content:
Could someone nicely either assist and or give me clues how id go about scripting the wheelthrottle command to the output of the engine throttle, 

So that I may control wheel RPM with the regular aerothrottle?

 

I Already do this on an indirect way with diesel electric locomotives

..but they can be moody and prone to bugs if not handled correctly.. Using the alternator rpm to drive a thirsty wheelset in gear (locked wheelthrottle)

This is for a friend new to the world of KSP trains and for use with a pure electric passenger set.

 

. Hence Im looking for a way to tell KOS to set the wheelthrottle to whatever percentage the aero throttles set at to regulate speed fed by a constant electricity supply

In my head it seems simple  just lack the command set knowhow

 

Thanks

(roverwheelsound mod is still on curse and github if anyone needs.a very important mod)

lock wheelthrottle to ship:control:pilotmainthrottle.

Is it that?
